Head description: tip of snout to the posterior edge of the maxilla
Caliper jaw position: Outside jaw measurement from forward point and centre of snout to back of maxilla
Inside jaw measurement firmly stretched against eye socket at vertical midpoint of eye

Head description: narrowest distance between eye sockets, measured on dorsal surface
Caliper jaw position: Outside jaw measurement of the horizontal midpoint of eyes on dorsal surface

Head description: tip of snout to anterior inner edge of eye socket
Caliper jaw position: Outside jaw measurement from forward point and centre of snout to horizontal midpoint of anterior edge of eye socket

Head description: posterior inner edge of orbit to visual insertion point of preopercle
Caliper jaw position: Outside jaw measurement from back of eye socket to preopercle bone insertion point. Preopercle must be lifted to expose preopercle bone underneath.

Head description: posterior inner edge of orbit to dorsal insertion of opercle
Caliper jaw position: Outside jaw measurement from back of eye socket to bone underneath gill cover notch at dorsal insertion of the opercle (rather than to flap of skin that forms notch).  The operculum must be held taut.
